acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle immutable POJOs with generified collections in the constructor
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleImmutablePojoWithGenerifiedCollectionsInConstructor

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ImmutableWithGenericCollectionsPojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the collection should not be null or empty

Then the collection should have exactly OneDimensionalTestPojo ( booleanField = true booleanObjectField = true byteField = 110 byteObjectField = 83 shortField = 25 shortObjectField = 25 charField = O charObjectField = Q intField = -452493227 intObjectField = 64938763 longField = 391512101913669 longObjectField = 391512101867989 floatField = 0.5414738 floatObjectField = 0.50533056 doubleField = 0.5789465042787812 doubleObjectField = 0.7018240933295256 stringField = HB248K7Qyc objectField = java.lang.Object@1a35f99a calendarField = Sun Jun 14 20:05:34 BST 2015 dateField = Sun Jun 14 20:05:34 BST 2015 randomArray = [Ljava.util.Random;@60aee4ca intArray = [I@6a3a3b93 booleanArray = [Z@50f71f48 bigDecimalField = 482437066498 ) elements
Then the Map<?, ?> <span class='step-parameter'>{3ZEJOSyRwd=java.util.GregorianCalendar[time=1434308734939 should contain at least one non empty element
Then the map should have exactly areFieldsSet=true elements
Then the collection should not be null or empty
Then the collection should have exactly java.lang.Object@1205d422 elements
